title: Becoming Friends with Geoff Keighley
description:
Mike attempted to become besties with Geoff. 

From this episode of the Kinda Funny Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KS5El0s0KZY&pp=ygUTa2luZGEgZnVubnkgcG9kYWNzdA%3D%3D


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

transcript_chunks.text: many of you know my goal this year has to become best friends with Jeff key that is something I wanted to do and uh I always make it a point to go up to him and appreciate him and say thank you for having us mind you I've only seen Jeff twice so I didn't need to go for a third I already did a great job right I walked right up to him I said Jeff key man thank you so much for a great weekend and he looked at me and he said so four out of 10 Mike really and I said Jeff you did a great job on the show a lot of the games they just didn't speak to me the beef continues he looked at me and he said oh yeah Mike but what do you like and I go I'm a basic guy I like Call of Duty and he shook his head and he looked at me he goes you should have gave it a six out of 10 Mike and starts walking away and I go no Jeff I told everyone we'd be best friends by the end of 2024 and he looks at he goes that's not going to happen now and just walked away from me
